1435.verse: ۞ وَٱتْلُ|And recite|109|122|4880$عَلَيْهِمْ|to them|73|99|22$نَبَأَ|the news|81|107|4881$نُوحٍ|(of) Nuh|75|101|4641$إِذْ|when|55|81|1198$قَالَ|he said|67|93|309$لِقَوْمِهِۦ|to his people,|110|123|512$يَـٰقَوْمِ|"O my people!|112|126|513$إِن|If|44|71|225$كَانَ|is|57|84|913$كَبُرَ|hard|57|84|5547$عَلَيْكُم|on you|76|103|416$مَّقَامِى|my stay|80|107|8227$وَتَذْكِيرِى|and my reminding|135|149|8228$بِـَٔـايَـٰتِ ٱللَّهِ|the Signs of Allah,|141|153|2612$فَعَلَى|then on|71|96|8229$ٱللَّهِ|Allah|53|78|606$تَوَكَّلْتُ|I put my trust.|118|143|8005$فَأَجْمِعُوٓاْ|So you all resolve|137|162|8230$أَمْرَكُمْ|your plan|81|93|8231$وَشُرَكَآءَكُمْ|and your partners.|143|152|8232$ثُمَّ|Then|53|72|293$لَا يَكُنْ|let not be|85|104|8233$أَمْرُكُمْ|(in) your plan|109|128|8234$عَلَيْكُمْ|for you|76|95|416$غُمَّةً|any doubt.|92|111|8235$ثُمَّ|Then|53|62|293$ٱقْضُوٓاْ|carry (it out)|107|151|8236$إِلَىَّ|upon me|76|163|2924$وَلَا|and (do) not|104|191|25$تُنظِرُونِ|give me respite.|126|170|7094$

1437.verse: فَكَذَّبُوهُ|But they denied him,|157|174|6500$فَنَجَّيْنَـٰهُ|so We saved him|132|166|8241$وَمَن|and (those) who|130|164|1012$مَّعَهُۥ|(were) with him|124|158|1875$فِى|in|48|65|89$ٱلْفُلْكِ|the ship,|78|89|6502$وَجَعَلْنَـٰهُمْ|and We made them|148|170|8242$خَلَـٰٓئِفَ|successors,|98|120|6238$وَأَغْرَقْنَا|and We drowned|131|153|495$ٱلَّذِينَ|those who|89|111|20$كَذَّبُواْ|denied|73|84|2650$بِـَٔـايَـٰتِنَا‌ۖ|Our Signs.|88|97|408$فَٱنظُرْ|Then see|81|98|2332$كَيْفَ|how|66|83|288$كَانَ|was|57|74|913$عَـٰقِبَةُ|(the) end|83|100|3299$ٱلْمُنذَرِينَ|(of) those who were warned.|214|223|8243$

1438.verse: ثُمَّ|Then|53|76|293$بَعَثْنَا|We sent|75|121|6650$مِنۢ بَعْدِهِۦ|after him|112|158|504$رُسُلاً|Messengers|97|143|4654$إِلَىٰ|to|53|99|118$قَوْمِهِمْ|their people,|103|126|8244$فَجَآءُوهُم|and they came to them|176|187|8245$بِٱلْبَيِّنَـٰتِ|with clear proofs.|136|159|880$فَمَا|But not|69|92|132$كَانُواْ|they were|87|110|94$لِيُؤْمِنُواْ|to believe|91|114|5948$بِمَا|what|53|64|43$كَذَّبُواْ|they had denied|127|140|2650$بِهِۦ|[it]|52|78|204$مِن قَبْلُ‌ۚ|before.|92|118|250$كَذَٲلِكَ|Thus|77|102|702$نَطْبَعُ|We seal|72|98|8246$عَلَىٰ|[on]|63|88|52$قُلُوبِ|the hearts|89|102|3365$ٱلْمُعْتَدِينَ|(of) the transgressors.|171|171|1682$

1439.verse: ثُمَّ|Then|53|66|293$بَعَثْنَا|We sent|75|100|6650$مِنۢ بَعْدِهِم|after them|116|141|2256$مُّوسَىٰ|Musa|83|108|499$وَهَـٰرُونَ|and Harun|102|127|4645$إِلَىٰ|to|53|78|118$فِرْعَوْنَ|Firaun|93|106|2649$وَمَلَإِيْهِۦ|and his chiefs|111|131|6651$بِـَٔـايَـٰتِنَا|with Our Signs,|121|161|408$فَٱسْتَكْبَرُواْ|but they were arrogant|175|215|6751$وَكَانُواْ|and were|83|123|615$قَوْمًا|a people|76|96|3073$مُّجْرِمِينَ|criminal.|104|104|7714$

1441.verse: قَالَ مُوسَىٰٓ|Musa said,|124|146|653$أَتَقُولُونَ|"Do you say|99|142|6348$لِلْحَقِّ|about the truth|123|166|8144$لَمَّا|when|55|98|3471$جَآءَكُمْ‌ۖ|it has come to you?|152|174|838$أَسِحْرٌ هَـٰذَا|Is this magic?|125|166|8249$وَلَا|But (will) not|106|188|25$يُفْلِحُ|succeed|75|157|5489$ٱلسَّـٰحِرُونَ|the magicians."|122|163|8250$

1442.verse: قَالُوٓاْ|They said,|89|101|101$أَجِئْتَنَا|"Have you come to us|166|189|6516$لِتَلْفِتَنَا|to turn us away|126|149|8251$عَمَّا|from that|82|105|724$وَجَدْنَا|we found|81|104|5291$عَلَيْهِ|on it|64|76|395$ءَابَآءَنَا|our forefathers,|124|145|1474$وَتَكُونَ لَكُمَا|and you two (may) have|184|225|8252$ٱلْكِبْرِيَآءُ|the greatness|112|153|8253$فِى|in|48|89|89$ٱلْأَرْضِ|the land?|92|113|100$وَمَا نَحْنُ|And we (are) not|134|218|8254$لَكُمَا|(in) you two|102|271|6308$بِمُؤْمِنِينَ|believers."|101|186|82$

1435.verse: And recite to them the news of Noah, when he said to his people, "O my people, if my residence and my reminding of the signs of Allah has become burdensome upon you - then I have relied upon Allah. So resolve upon your plan and [call upon] your associates. Then let not your plan be obscure to you. Then carry it out upon me and do not give me respite.

1436.verse: And if you turn away [from my advice] then no payment have I asked of you. My reward is only from Allah, and I have been commanded to be of the Muslims."

1437.verse: And they denied him, so We saved him and those with him in the ship and made them successors, and We drowned those who denied Our signs. Then see how was the end of those who were warned.

1438.verse: Then We sent after him messengers to their peoples, and they came to them with clear proofs. But they were not to believe in that which they had denied before. Thus We seal over the hearts of the transgressors

1439.verse: Then We sent after them Moses and Aaron to Pharaoh and his establishment with Our signs, but they behaved arrogantly and were a criminal people

1440.verse: So when there came to them the truth from Us, they said, "Indeed, this is obvious magic."

1441.verse: Moses said, "Do you say [thus] about the truth when it has come to you? Is this magic? But magicians will not succeed."

1442.verse: They said, "Have you come to us to turn us away from that upon which we found our fathers and so that you two may have grandeur in the land? And we are not believers in you."
